Name: Dream Catchers
About the game: The Adventures of Dreamcatchers Protecting the World in Dreams! The VR animation Dreamcatcher is the story of Dreamcatcher, which prevents Nightmare's attack that threatens the world in the dream. In particular, you can create your own shield and weapon using a brush, and you can feel the weight of a virtual object through your own wearable equipment. Alimoli Studio is a studio that specializes in planning and producing animations, and has a variety of contents businesses based on original and solid planning. We are planning and producing excellent staff members who have been proven in various fields, and we are proud of the best teamwork in Korea by building collaboration and know-how with each other through various works. Their creative + planning + design skills represent Alimoli Studios.
